English: Astrabirsk front lines, central Kolguyev

BAZA TO ALL UNITS. OPERATION BEGINS. TO ALL UNITS, PREPARE YOUR SQUADS AND WAIT FOR PLATOON YURI TO COMMENCE THE OFFENSIVE. THE ENEMY EXPECTS AN ATTACK AND FORTIFIED HIS POSITIONS BUT WE CAN ENDURE, COMRADES! GOOD LUCK TO YOU ALL, BAZA OUT.
TATYANA TO YURI, WE'RE READY WHENEVER YOU ARE! LEAD THE CHARGE, OUT.
COMRADES, TIME TO TEACH THOSE AMERICAN DOGS A LESSON! I EXPECT ABSOLUTE BEST FROM EACH AND EVERY ONE OF YOU! KEEP IN FORMATION AND SHOOT EVERYTHING THAT MOVES! GET READY, COMRADES, WE'RE GOING SOUTH!
YURI TO ALL UNITS UNITS, WE'RE COMMENCING THE ATTACK. ANTON AND BORIS, GO IN! YURI AND TATYANA MOVING DOWN THE ROAD, CONTACT WITH THE ENEMY IMMINENT. OVER.
ANTON TO YURI. WE'RE HEADING OUT. OUT.
BORIS TO YURI, WE BEGIN OUR ATTACK AS WELL. SEE YOU IN THE BASE, OUT.
YURI TO ALL UNITS, ROAD IS CLEAR. WE'RE MOVING ON TO THE YENISEI BASE. OUT.
YURI TO ALL UNITS, THE YENISEI BASE IS SECURE. ANTON AND BORIS, ASSUME DEFENSIVE POSITIONS. TATYANA AND YURI CONTINUE ON SOUTH. OUT.
YURI TO TATYANA, ASSUME YOUR POSITION AND COVER OUR FLANK. WE'RE MOVING FURTHER SOUTH. OUT.
YURI TO IVAN, WE'RE BEGINNING OUR DESCENT THROUGH THE VALLEY. COMMENCE YOUR ATTACK, OUT.
IVAN TO YURI. UNDERSTOOD. ATTACK COMMENCED. OUT.

IVAN TO YURI, THERE WAS AN ERROR IN THE INTEL, WE ARE OUTNUMBERED! THE ENEMY IS FORTIFIED AND HAS SO MUCH! WE CAN'T HOPE TO BREAKTHROUGH, IT'S FUTILE! WE HAVE TO RETREAT, I REPEAT, WE ARE RETREATING, OUT!
YURI TO IVAN, HOLD ON! IF YOU LEAVE WE ARE PINCERED BETWEEN ENEMY FORCES! YURI TO IVAN, DO YOU COPY? YURI TO IVAN, DO YOU READ? FUCK, IVAN'S OUT!

YURI TO ALL UNITS, WE HAVE TO RETREAT BACK NORTH. WE CAN'T TAKE THE NEVA BASE FROM OUR POSITION. IF THE ENEMY HAS ENOUGH FORCES TO SMASH IVAN THEY WILL SOON BE UPON US AND WE'RE LIKE SITTING DUCKS HERE! WE'RE RETREATING, OUT.
Tatyana
